title: Scorer
description: Assign custom scores to data records based on arbitrary data attributes using AI.

dataset.title: Dataset
dataset.description: Dataset containing the data records to process. Either an Apify dataset ID or a URL to a parquet file.

model.title: LLM Model
model.description: The LLM provider and model to be used for scoring. Format: provider/model (e.g., 'openai/gpt-4', 'anthropic/claude-3-sonnet')

attrs.title: Record Attributes
attrs.description: List of record attributes/columns to use for scoring. If null, all attributes are used. This allows focusing on specific fields in your data.

name.title: Score Name
name.description: Name of the score to assign (e.g., 'relevance', 'quality', 'purchase_probability'). This will be the column name in the output.

type.title: Score Type
type.description: Whether to return the score as 'integer' or 'float'.

min.title: Minimum Score
min.description: Minimum value of the score range.

max.title: Maximum Score
max.description: Maximum value of the score range.

description.title: Score Description
description.description: Detailed description of what the score represents and how it should be assigned. This helps the AI model understand your scoring criteria.
